name: Easy Vegan Chickpea Curry with Potatoes
description: This easy vegan chickpea curry with potatoes, peas, and carrots is perfect for quick weeknight dinners! It’s delicious, comforting, and packed with protein and nutrients. And it’s ready in only 30 minutes!
recipeIngredient: 2  small potatoes, cut into small pieces
1 teaspoon red curry paste (optional) (adjust if the curry paste you're using is very spicy, mine was very mild)

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the rice according to the instructions on the package.
recipeInstructions.name: Cook the rice according to the instructions on the package.

recipeInstructions.text: In a large pan, heat some oil and sauté the onion for 2-3 minutes. Then add the potatoes and cook for another 3 minutes. Stir in the red curry paste and the curry and cook for another minute.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large pan, heat some oil and sauté the onion for 2-3 minutes. Then add the potatoes and cook for another 3 minutes. Stir in the red curry paste and the curry and cook for another minute.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the coconut milk, vegetable broth, carrot, chickpeas, and peas and cook for about 20 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the coconut milk, vegetable broth, carrot, chickpeas, and peas and cook for about 20 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Season with salt and pepper and serve with cashews and cilantro.
recipeInstructions.name: Season with salt and pepper and serve with cashews and cilantro.
